feedbackErr.message: Your feedback should be at least 10 character!

feedbackThanks.message: We have received your notification, we will notify you by mail

landing.firstText: Are you ready to speak English?
landing.secondText: Select a word category from the list.
landing.thirdText: See the words you will learn before you start speaking.
landing.fourthText: Watch movie-series scenes with words of your chosen category!
landing.fifthText: Let's repeat it now! Talk a While will check to see if you're telling the truth.
landing.sixthText: That's great if you pronounce it right! Let's move on to the next word.
landing.seventhText: Are you having trouble saying the words? Try again or skip to the next word.
landing.eighthText: You can see the progress in the panel. Collect points to open next categories!

share.likeText: What about supporting Talk a While to a friend and supporting the development of the app? Tell a friend you love about Talk a While!
share.sharingText: I found a great app where you can practice speaking English by watching salute, series and movies ðŸ˜Š. You can download it from this link:
